entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Async overloads of `Console.Write[Line]` #104182
  • [API Proposal]: Add `System.Threading.ConditionVariable` type #104179
  • GC Assert failure: committed_by_oh[oh] == compute_committed_bytes_per_heap (oh, committed_bookkeeping) #104178
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Csp.Tests failing on macOS x64 Debug #104172
  • [Apple] TvOS-arm64 failures on Serialization ExporterTypesTests #104162
  • [apple] TvOS-arm64 X509Certificates failures during AppleCrypto interop #104161
  • [API Proposal]: Add AuthenticationHeaderValue constructor accepting AuthenticationSchemes enum #104159
  • [cdacreader] Simplify build order and dependencies #104158
    Future
  • Arm64/Sve: Track if mask registers will be used and zero out if not #104157
    10.0.0
  • Unload_TwoCollectibleWithOneAssemblyAndOneInstanceReferencingAnother test failed in CI #104153
  • Compilation in Windows Container fails #104146
  • At least packages.microsoft.com has 8.0.7 version #104145
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters throws TypeInitializationException for WASM/Mobile #104142
    9.0.0
  • Add bucket size hints to histograms #104137
  • msbuild can not generate Publish.html file #104135

Closed

  • Unhandled exception. System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: No such host is known. (https:80) #102710
  • [Performance] Regression in multiple scenarios, Linux, more significant on ARM64 #102832
    9.0.0
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\eventsourceerror\\eventsourceerror\\eventsourceerror.cmd #81241
    Future
  • MemoryCache creates lots of tasks that cause CPU/Memory spikes on compaction. #97736
    9.0.0
  • Test failure eventsourceerror.sh on macOS x64: NullReferenceException #73034
    Future
  • 2nd call to MemoryCache.Set() with the same key erases entry if cache is full #36039
    Future
  • System.Text.Json generated serialization code should follow performance best practices #104169
  • Documentation status of _AggressiveAttributeTrimming #88805
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Serialize<TValue>(TValue, JsonSerializerOptions?) throws an undocument ArgumentException #104168
  • Arm64/Sve: Revisit scalable register save/restore in prolog/epilogue #103320
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions #93927
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: EventKeywords Enum Is Missing 0x80 To Enable Activity ID's #92790
    Future
  • AV in GcInfoDecoder #103894
    9.0.0
  • Extend System.Guid with a new creation API for v7 #103658
    9.0.0
  • [Mono JIT] Extend Linux perf jitdump functionality #36774
    9.0.0
  • Fatal error!!!! #100264
  • [mono] Enable -Werror on all CI lanes #41357
    9.0.0
  • WCF service with DataContract and EnumValues not returning enum values in result #101594
  • [mono] Tracking: Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx` #60483
    Future
  • [mono] Tracking: Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx2` #60484
    Future
  • [mono] Tracking: Implement `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.AvxVnni` #60485
    Future
  • [mono] AOT compiler fails when assembly files are named in other cultures #65484
    6.0.x
  • [crossgen2-composite gcstress] OSX x64 failures with "External disassembler is not available" #71931
    9.0.0
  • Composite ReadyToRun fails when RelativePath has a path component #79902
    9.0.0
  • [MONO][TEST] runtime-llvm pipeline is not working #81563
    9.0.0
  • Mono runtime fails to build cross-compilers for x86/x64 on arm/arm64 #82495
    9.0.0
  • Failure in System.Threading.RateLimiting.Test.ConcurrencyLimiterTests.DoesNotDeadlockCleaningUpCanceledRequestedLease_Post #91653
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] Long Running Test: System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskPropertiesTests.TaskIDTest #91907
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] [Long Running Test] System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.CESchedulerPairTests.TestCompletionTask #91434
    9.0.0
  • Confused about unobserved exception #91100
    9.0.0
  • Thread.abort obselete and blocking inner calls, no way to abort the blocking call #104147
  • Can we enable rebase & merge in this repo? #56305
    Future
  • AndroidStripILAfterAOT causing "InvalidProgramException: Invalid IL code in Xunit.Assert:True(bool)" #103782
    9.0.0
  • Go over trimming tests we disabled for AOT #101228
    9.0.0
  • Blazor WASM: breakpoints on property setter not hit #102012
    9.0.0
  • Blazor WASM build unable to find `python` in $PATH on CBL Mariner 2.0 with .NET 6 #98714
    9.0.0
  • Re-enable System.Resources.Extensions.BinaryFormat.Tests test project #103447
    9.0.0
  • [Android] PlatformNotSupported failures inside System.Net.Security.Tests #104010
  • System.Text.Json Deserializing Nested Recursive Strings Problem #104133
  • [browser][MT] Assertion interp.c:4259 #102251
    9.0.0
  • MetaDataGetDispenser export missing for PublishSingleFile=true, and --self-contained #103687
  • RegexGenerator generating code with error CS0165. #103942
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix superpmi collect failure for crossgen2 on linux x64. #104181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Use new interceptor pattern #104180
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Optimize Vector128<long> multiplication for arm64 #104177
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Centralize the folding logic for ConditionalSelect and ensure side effects aren't dropped #104175
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Xml serializer test updates prep for reflection work #104173
    area-Serialization
  • Add support for `SwiftSelf<T>` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104171
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Poly fill Index and Range types #104170
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Get rid of fluent assertions in System.Resources.Extensions.BinaryFormat.Tests #104166
    area-System.Resources, binary-serialization
  • Obsolete X509Certificate{2} constructors and X509Certificate2Collection.Import #104165
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Remove uses of CLRJIT_AZ_KEY/clrjit_key1 from SPMI #104164
    needs-area-label
  • [draft] testing memory stats of FF in helix #104152
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, 9.0.0
  • increase the allocation threshold for tests that need to ensure that 2GB+ does not get pre-allocated #104151
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.ConditionalExtract* APIs #104150
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [wasm] Disallow not useful configuration combinations #104149
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Avoid scanning isinst checks when building whole program view #104148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Added `ReleaseCores` to `BuildEngine` usages that did not have it. #104141
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix coreclr test readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_de… #104140
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Tracing out of proc sampling #104134
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution
  • prevent feeding too much data to schannel during renegotiation #104130
    area-System.Net.Security

Merged

  • Arm64/Sve: Enable Sve only if vector length is 128 #104174
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Accelerate Vector128<long>::op_Multiply on x64 #103555
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Avoid long busy-waiting between hijack retries. #103212
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [NRBF] change StartsWithPayloadHeader to accept a Span rather than array #103636
    new-api-needs-documentation, binary-serialization, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • [tests] Use net8.0 for the project used to restore workload manifest nuget, instead of net6.0 #104067
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add NULL checks to GetClassWithPossibleAV #104128
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix #97736 in MemoryCache.cs with a lock around the TriggerOvercapacityC... method #103992
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Subtract prior entry size when adding entry to cache #103931
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • ARM64-SVE: Implement `ShiftLeftLogical`, `ShiftRightArithmetic`, `ShiftRightLogical` #104119
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Add dotnet/designs link to docs README #104155
    area-Meta
  • Revert "Fix potential Debug.Assert in QuicListener" #104154
    area-System.Net
  • Arm64/SVE: Add support to handle predicate registers as callee-trash #104065
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add non-public SetEntryAssembly() API to System.Reflection #103726
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.x
  • Fix definite assignment error in regex source gen for some lazy loops #104007
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix AV in GcInfoDecoder #103938
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix infinite loop in IGenericCacheEntry.CreateAndCache #104126
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rewrite TagList for .NET 8+ #104132
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Adding support for Guid.CreateVersion7 #104124
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move protected member check in the class #104118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Capture first line of linker version only #104136
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bucket failing Xml trimming test apps #102449
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix the race condition issue of aot_module loading #103975
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Only build the most recent source generator when building from source #104139
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • re-enable BinaryFormatter tests, fixes #103447 #104104
    area-System.Resources
  • [Android] Fix SslStreamCertificateContext empty custom trust store exception #104016
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [release/6.0] Surface error when `emcc -version` failed. #103967
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.33
  • [wasi] Revert "Always allocate when computing temp path" #104109
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO, os-browser
  • [wasm] Repair very old merge damage and update comments #104052
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add user_events to the GC event level caching logic #104079
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [x64][SysV] Classify empty structs for passing like padding #103799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid MakeGenericMethod in XmlSerializer #102482
    area-Serialization
  • Revert "Re-enable eventsourceerror for Unix/CoreCLR" #104131
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Added SVE APIs `CreateMaskForFirstActiveElement` and `CreateMaskForNextActiveElement` #104002
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • [HttpClientFactory] Do not log query string by default #103769
    NO-MERGE, breaking-change, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix #103485 #103935
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use the same method to generate DllImportAttribute in local methods and P/Invoke forwarders #103973
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • Print linking instructions for NativeLib=static #103960
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `ConvertToint64` and `ConvertToUInt64` #104069
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • ARM64-SVE: Add SVE registers to pal context #103801
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2484755 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Add nativeaot support on LoongArch64. #103889
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Shoring up XmlSerializer/Schema tests #101621
    area-Serialization
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #103937
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 9.0.0
  • Extract shared IL pattern analysis to a class #103701
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [nomerge] [GC] Add verification and logging to region_free_list #104061
    area-GC-coreclr
  • remove unnecessary Avx512VL ISA flags. #103144
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution, avx512
  • JIT: Fix LA64 and RISCV64 build errors on Windows #100099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Optimize "(vec & cns) == zero" on arm64 #102705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [DRAFT] More TypeName APIs #103713
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, binary-serialization
  • Add support for `SwiftIndirectResult` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104111
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Convert Array.IsSimpleCopy and CanAssignArray type to managed #104103
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [coreclr] Remove CatchHardwareExceptionHolder #104121
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASIp2 #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [NRBF] Reject orphaned records and invalid references #103632
    binary-serialization, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • Fix type parsing issues in ILLink and ILC #104060
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add QEMU detection check #104125
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [ios][HybridGlobalization] Fix default culture #104071
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Avoid scanning typeof checks when building whole program view #103883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Unify LSRA call arg building #104051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Implement TODO in mono-threads-wasi.S #101337
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • STJ: Support serialization callbacks for collection and dictionary types #104120
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • UnixCommandLinePing.cs: improve searching for the system ping binary #103838
    area-System.Net, os-linux, community-contribution
  • JIT: ARM64 - Added SVE APIs `ExtractLastVector`, `ExtractLastScalar`, `ExtractAfterLastVector`, `ExtractAfterLastScalar` #103847
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
